imageBoxes.title: Macmillan
imageBoxes.description: Macmillan - one of the US Big Five publishing houses, - operates a number of business process automation digital products. Thanks to the extensive experience in this domain, we helped the publisher extend their software departments, and remain their trusted technology partner since.
imageBoxes.testimonial: “Codex Software provides invaluable help when it is needed the most. Their contributions to the key components, broad technology expertise and persistent high quality of delivery make them the partner of choice for us.”

imageBoxes.title: The Loadown
imageBoxes.description: We developed a data analytics platform designed to monitor App Store apps’ rankings in real time, providing valuable insights for data-driven marketing decisions in real time. The solution is able to seamlessly process terabytes of data.
imageBoxes.testimonial: “Codex Software helped us create a complex, yet elegant solution for our real-time marketing platform. We highly recommend Codex Software for anyone looking for a serious IT outsourcing service provider!”

imageBoxes.title: Markerr
imageBoxes.description: Codex Software teamed up with the Customer to develop several software solutions in the ecosystem of a data analytics platform. The solutions included  a fraud detection instrument for the banking sector, a report comparison tool for investment companies, among others.

imageBoxes.title: Axis.xyz
imageBoxes.description: We've helped Axis.xyz, a business intelligence and data analytics platform for the investment sector, develop a comprehensive BI software solution able to retrieve and analyse data from numerous sources, and visualise it via custom dashboards equipped with complex (over 500 custom nodes) interactive social graphs.
